Posts.Content: Bluyz1966 wrote: I would love to hear from others that have had breast cancer that spread to the ovaries. I had a profalactic (sp?) hysterectomy on May 2 and they found that breast cancer had spread to my left ovary. I have been a breast cancer survivor for 2 years and was on tamoxifen. My Onc has me on Aromasin for 5 years. No chemo, no other treatment. She said they caught it early. I am wondering if there is anyone that can tell me about their similar experience? Thanks so much! Linda Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Mets to Ovary Bluyz1966 LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2008 03:55AM Bluyz1966 wrote: I guess I forgot to mention, I did have a PET and CT scan done. It shows no spread.
